ComicInfo.Title: The Asshole On TV
ComicInfo.Summary:
The karate-packed kick-you-in-the-back conclusion of the USActionForce storyline is finally HERE! It’s a dizzying gauntlet of terror as Sam and Cyn are captured and thrust into a deadly maze of freakish villains, each more hideous than the last! And what awaits them if they win? Their most dangerous enemy yet—SAM’S FAMILY! Join us for thrills, chills, and robotic kills this month because IT'S TIME TO START RUNNING!
